name: Blue Ocean Online Tax Consultant
tag_list: etaxmentor, online-tax-filing, corporatefiling, efiling, etaxfiling, onlinetaxfiling
overview:
BLUE OCEAN ONLINE TAX CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED To assist the common man’s query regarding tax, we offer a range of financial services related to accounting, auditing, income tax, service tax, etc……..

A Prelude In today’s laissez faire state, public finance plays a vital role in the development of the country. Unlike the developed countries, the proportion of Indian tax payers is meager. Ironically, around 5% of the huge 108 million population are covered under various taxes in the country. With its massive population, India needs honest tax payers in order to meet the ever growing financial burden. Faced with all such taxing issues, the common man needs proper consultancy and guidance to save as well as invest his money in the most prudent way. In an endeavour to assist your needs in tax and financial services, Blue Ocean Online Tax Consultants Private limited started its journey in the year 2007. Empowered with experts from renowned financial institutes like ICAI, ICSI and other premier institutions, the company offers a complete range of financial services including tax planning, financial planning, auditing, income tax, service tax, etc. Some of our major clients include Motorola, Oracle, Deloitte and many more. More About Us Finance is undoubtedly the life blood of every business activity. But this important discipline is too complicated for a layman to tackle alone. This is the main reason that leads to the bad count of income taxation in India. We, Blue Ocean Online Tax Consultants Private limited, are committed to provide the best tax and financial planning services at economical charges. The company provides consultancy in the areas of tax planning, income tax, financial services, company law matters, internal audit, statutory audit, etc. We provide services to all accesses, ranging from big corporates and business houses to individuals, HUF’s and self employed professionals.

Our portfolio also includes consultation for financial plans, monthly budgets, E-TDS, Foreign exchange management issues in reinforce of funds and other allied services as per your requirements and expectations. ‘eTaxMentor’ was formed by a group of young professionals to encourage people at large to undertake wise tax planning, file their return & pay taxes. In our effort towards building the nation, we thought taxation is an area where we can provide cluster of services to diversified clients. Our Activities We, Blue Ocean Online Tax Consultants Private limited, are expert consultants & negotiators engaged in providing all sorts of tax and financial services to corporate houses, self employed professionals, salaried class employees, etc. We offer expert services in the following areas: â€¢ Income tax â€¢ Sales tax â€¢ Tax planning â€¢ Cost control â€¢ Management consultancy â€¢ Company law matters â€¢ New business â€¢ Internal audit â€¢ Statutory audit, etc. Our portfolio also includes consultation for financial plans, monthly budgets, E-TDS, Foreign exchange management issues in reinforce of funds. Our Vision Our sole motto is to provide excellent services in Indian Tax laws with continuous learning and innovation, and to be instrumental in nation building. We believe that wise tax planning will lead to minimize tax liability and joining hands in contributing towards the exchequer’s budget.

Team of Experts To deliver esteemed services in our arena, we are well supported by an expert team of Chartered Accountants, Chartered Financial Analysts, MBA’s, Company Secretaries and others. Our enthusiastic and dynamic team is capable of solving complex problems related to finance and taxation in the least possible time frame. The company strives to provide superior services to its clients through a precisely framed business strategy. Our Strengths The following factors strengthen and help us in fulfilling all our business objectives: â€¢ Complete expertise in the discipline of financial planning and taxation â€¢ Team of qualified professionals to provide esteemed services â€¢ Wealth of experience and expertise in the domain â€¢ Trust and support of a large number of satisfied clients â€¢ Committed to deliver the best, we leave no room for customer grievances.
